feed.title: La Vérendrye (Réserve faunique) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , La Vérendrye (Réserve faunique)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:21 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Maniwaki Airport 2:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: 2.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 97.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 91 %
Dewpoint: 1.0°C
Wind: ESE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
